instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
Hello friends, I have a macbook pro 820-3787-A that does not turn on.
PPDCIN_G3H_INRUSH = 0v
PPBUS_G3H = 0v
CHGR_SGATE = 0v

The voltage goes up to q7180 ppdcin_g3h = 20v and chgr_agate_div = 19.20v
I have changed the isl625 charging circuit 3 times thinking that the one they sent me was bad.

I have 6 months with that damaged macbook, it is mine, when I started to repair it, the macbook turned on when I pressed the charging ic.

Sorry for so much trouble, I hope you can help me fix it

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
Do you get 3V42_G3H voltage?
Check diode mode to ground at L7095 and F7140.

Post U7100 basic voltages; pins 1, 2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.
Use surrounding components as test points; do not check directly on chip pins (when possible).

Exact resistance (ohm scale) between pins 17/18 and 27/28?

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
"3 = 0v"
Missing ACIN for ISL6259.
Replace R7110; be sure has good traces.
Also check R7111.

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
"3 = 0v"
Don't you want to solve that???

Mira el esquema e intenta entenderlo...

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message: Ya tengo voltage en pin 3 = 5v, después de cambiar las resistencias ya lo tengo

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message: Do you get PPBUS_G3H voltage now?

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message: [I]PPBUS_G3H = 0.8v   -- diodo 0.424 -- resistencia 1.007k[/I]

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
PPBUS_G3H = 0.8v -- diodo 0.424 -- resistencia 1.007k

Isla6259 pin 24 = 0v -- diode 0..422v -- resistencia 1.130K

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message: A ver otra vez los voltajes en todos los pines mencionados antes.

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
"9 = 4.3v"
Check resistance between pins 27/28 (ohm scale); bad R7121/22???

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
revise la resistencia de R2171 y r7122 y estan bien, 
la resistencia entre pin 27 y 28  es de 7.10M ohms

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message: 10 ohms de valor

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
Como puedes conseguir 10 + 10 + 0.020 = 7100000 ???
Eso, ni Houdini...

Has pensado en alguna pista rota/corroida, entre dichos resistores?

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message: Aveces suelo hacer magia, pero nunca tanta 🤣🤣, listo ya quedó la MacBook, ya enciende, solo me falta probar si funciona el SSD ya que recuerdo no lo detecta a, pero mañana te confirmo para ver si me puedes ayudar, dejo una foto de el problema, solo le bajó la calidad a las fotos porque no me deja subirlas, muchas gracias amigo por la ayuda

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
amigo, regreso este equipo se calienta al cargar, el cargador llega hasta 50grados centigrados, y en consumo llega hasta 4.5A, aparte cuando se utiliza con la bateria, se descarga muy rapido. te pongo los links de los videos de la camara termica.


[URL='https://drive.google.com/file/d/18QaD-NupRBD-2LQ7TCzjYS9ckF1mi4US/view?usp=share_link']con cargador[/URL]
[URL='https://drive.google.com/file/d/18W1uBDfgYhflqSTHxjZgDb5aZpzKo8M2/view?usp=share_link']Sin cargador[/URL]

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
Si la bateria es vieja, o china, no puedes esperar que aguante mucho.
Ademas, cuando se usa la grafica dedicada, el consumo sube.
Al menos revisa cuantos ciclos lleva la bateria.

"el cargador llega hasta 50grados centigrados"
No me parece una temperatura muy elevada.
Es normal que caliente si hay gran consumo; 85W Apple original?
Desactivar GPU disminuye el consumo y alarga la vida de la bateria.

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message: pero es normal que la computadora se alente demaciado cuando calienta el cargador ?

threads.title: 820-3787-A does not turn on
threads.message:
Run corresponding ASD, or start in Diagnostic mode and check for errors.
HWMonitor can also help you.
